message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $18000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you is $8000. I'm confident you'll love it!
Alice, $18000 is way above my budget.  I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $8500.  Let me know if you're willing to negotiate.

I understand you're on a budget, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer you the product for $12000, which is a compromise between our initial offer and your counteroffer. Let me know if this works for you!

Alice, $12000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $9500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to me and the fact that I'm willing to buy it now.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $10000, which is a fair price considering the value you place on the product. Let's see if we can finalize the deal!
